channel.title: Help
channel.description: Hi, i have a server that i been editing a lot lately and i want to change the amount of money a player gets when they are stealing for the stall, where would i go to change this? i am using a AirScape Source, 317. if you need anymore info just ask thanks.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

yeh search the id to the stall in client java

you will find something like ( exept the numbers, they may be others)

addItem(21000, 995)

change the 21000 to the number of cash you want :]

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Yeah its not that popular, its really buggy but i’ve been working on it and its pretty nice now but heres a link to the topic i dled it fromhttp://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459744.msg3363860.html#msg3363860 and also can you be more specific? when you say

look for the stall id, and search it up in the id
would i look in client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

airscape? not familiar, anyways, look for the stall id, and search it up in the id, make sure you see the message it sends when you pickpocket it too, there it should say like add 995, 1000000 (or whatever number you have) change the 1000000 to w/e you want, dunno what airscape is, i’ll assume its delta

Read full topic
